title: Http server is too slow on windows amd64 single thread
body:
by **coocood**: 
1.Write a simplist hello world http server application.
2.Run apache ab test
3.The result is about 600 reqests/second
4.Set runtime.GOMAXPROCS() to 2 or more
5.Rerun apache ab test
6.The result is about 8500 request per second

What is the expected output?

benchmark near 10000 requests per second

What do you see instead?

benchmark under 600 requests per second

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

windows 7 64bit

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

devel +f12b24ea373f Sun Mar 17

Please provide any additional information below.
